title: 99% Invisible-32- Design for Airports
description: When I spoke with Allison Arieff about the design of airports, she said to me, if all airports simply played Brian Eno’s album Ambient 1: Music for Airports over the speakers, every airport would be better. I say this to … Continue reading →
author: roman@99pi.org (Roman Mars)
